We can further compute a measure of the residence time of ξ( t) in the neighborhood of ξ( t 1) by estimating the extremal index ϑ. Its inverse is a measure of consecutive exceedances of a threshold (
40 ). We computed ϑ using the Süveges estimator (
41 ), which has been shown to provide robust estimates for climatic data series (
15 ). Then, θ(ξ( t 1)) = ϑ(ξ( t 1))/Δ t, where Δ t is the time step of our data.
